name: super-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Super Rod list for an area, which are generally the best available there.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The best fishing rod for catching wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: The best fishing rod for catching wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild POKéMON.
